hero.title: About Student's Job
hero.subtitle: Connecting talented students with their dream careers

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're on a mission to revolutionize how students find employment opportunities. By connecting talented students with forward-thinking employers, we're building bridges to successful careers and helping shape the future workforce.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Constantly improving our platform to provide the best job search experience

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Maintaining honest and transparent relationships with all our users

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: Creating equal opportunities for students from all backgrounds

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Making a real difference in students' career journeys

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Creating an account is simple! Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner, enter your email address, create a password, and you're ready to go.

questions.question: Is the service free for students?
questions.answer: Yes! Student's Job is completely free for students. We believe in providing equal access to career opportunities for all students.

questions.question: How do I apply for jobs?
questions.answer: Once you've created an account and completed your profile, you can browse available positions and apply directly through our platform with just a few clicks.

questions.question: Can I use the platform if I'm still studying?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We especially encourage current students to use our platform to find internships and part-time positions that fit their schedule.

questions.question: How do I contact employers?
questions.answer: After applying for a position, you can communicate with employers through our built-in messaging system. This ensures professional and tracked communication.

questions.question: What types of jobs are available?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of opportunities including internships, part-time positions, project-based work, and full-time roles suitable for students and recent graduates.

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.testimonial1: Found my first internship through Student's Job. The platform made it incredibly easy to connect with employers.
testimonials.testimonial2: The quality of job opportunities here is outstanding. I've built valuable connections for my career.
testimonials.testimonial3: Student's Job helped me land my dream position. The process was smooth and professional.

auction.title: Talent Auction
auction.subtitle: Companies are competing for your skills

notEnoughApplications.title: Not Enough Applications
notEnoughApplications.description: You need to apply to at least 3 positions before participating in the auction.

countdown.title: Auction Starting Soon
countdown.description: Get ready to receive competitive offers from top companies!

welcome.title: Welcome to Talent Auction
welcome.description: Companies will compete for your talent through a 4-stage bidding process. Each stage focuses on a different aspect of the job offer.

salary.title: Stage 1: Salary Bidding
salary.description: Companies will bid on your base salary. Each company has 10 seconds to make their offer, and the highest bid sets the bar for the next company.

equity.title: Stage 2: Equity Offering
equity.description: Companies will offer equity percentages in their organization. This represents your ownership stake in the company.

benefits.title: Stage 3: Benefits Package
benefits.description: Companies will compete on benefits packages, including health insurance, vacation days, professional development, and other perks.

position.title: Stage 4: Position Level
position.description: Finally, companies will bid on your position level, from Junior to Head of Department, affecting your role and responsibilities.
